      • addKillToKilltrack

        public void addKillToKilltrack(PlayerColor color,
                               boolean overkill)
        Add token with killer color to killtrack, if overkill add a label that indicate that 2 tokens are added. If in frenzy, it display a new box and add tokens to correct label.
        Parameters:
        color - Killer color
        overkill - Indicate if kill is an overkill
